detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PhoreToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhoreToken.sol#71-178) has payable functions:
	 - PhoreToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhoreToken.sol#175-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
